name: Trilogy: Against the Machine
description:
Trilogy: Against the Machine 

Are 3 separate experiences, that have one thing in common: machines.

Game1: Set your mood for free today.

Setting: You have a vending machine in front of you, you can pick your mood for today with it, if you dont like it feel free to try as many times as you want, just be careful with the status of the vending machine.

Game2: The Keyboard Train

Setting: You are in train  and keys start to enter, press them so you can sit them, but careful! if you dont sit them they maybe get angry.

Game3: My voice can save lives, cubes lives

Setting: Use your voice to move your cube, try to save many as you can, but again be careful, who knows maybe someone is always watching you.
